verses.text:
Rest for the toil-ing hand, Rest for the anx-ious brow,
Rest for the wea-ry, way-worn feet, Rest for the suf-f'rer now.
Rest, peace-ful rest, be-neath the shade of Cal-va-ry's tree;
There is rest for the wea-ry, there is rest for thee.

Rest for the ach-ing heart, Rest for the trou-bled soul,
Rest for the heal-ing, gra-cious word, Rest that will make thee whole.
Rest, peace-ful rest, be-neath the shade of Cal-va-ry's tree;
There is rest for the wea-ry, there is rest for thee.

Rest in the ho-ly place, Rest in the mer-cy seat,
Rest in the arms of Je-sus Christ, Rest ev-er-last-ing, sweet.
Rest, peace-ful rest, be-neath the shade of Cal-va-ry's tree;
There is rest for the wea-ry, there is rest for thee.
